palace.name: Palace
palace.detail: Place to hold morning daily meeting. The atmosphere is solumn.

liuBian.name: Emperor Liu Bian
liuBian.detail: The pitful Emperor is just sitting there with pale face, like a puppet.

ministers.name: Ministers
ministers.detail: Ministers bowed their bodies, waiting for Dong Zhuo's words.

dongZhuo.name: Dong Zhuo:
dongZhuo.detail: "Everyone heads up. Today our Emperor has something to announce. Your Majesty, please."

dongZhuo2.name: Emperor Liu Bian:
dongZhuo2.detail: "I am sick. I feel I can no longer be a king and deal with government affairs. I announce to pass my position to my little brother, Liu Xie. But he is still too young. Before he becomes mature, I'll let Dong Zhuo deal with all government affairs."

dongZhuo3.name: Brave Minister:
dongZhuo3.detail: "Object! Your Majesty, this mustn't be your real will. It is Dong Zhuo, who forced you saying that, is it?"

dongZhuo5.name: Dong Zhuo:
dongZhuo5.detail: "Rude dog! You dare to suspect our Emperor? Guards! Pull him out and kill him!"
